entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 this afternoon. High 23. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Becoming clear overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023
